attributes.action: get rid of the house of lords
attributes.additional_details: BECAUSE THEY KEEP BLOCKING THE DEMOCRATICALLY ELECTED GOVERNMENT FROM CARRYING OUT THE WILL OF THE PEOPLE
attributes.background: GET RID OF THE UNELECTED HOUSE OF LORDS AND REPLACE IT WITH A DEMOCRATIC BODY

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637924
Abolish the House of Lords

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635458
Hold a referendum on replacing the House of Lords with an elected Senate
